EmailTemplate.name: STOPVAC
EmailTemplate.subject: Your vacation request stop has been processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Subscriber Services. Your vacation request stop has been processed. Your print delivery is scheduled to stop on {!Transaction_Log__c.Stop_Date__c}and all deliveries are scheduled to resume on {!Transaction_Log__c.Start_Date__c}
While you're away, your delivery, digital access, and account charges will be suspended. If you want your digital access to continue, please contact customer service at 215-222-2765
Have questions? We're here to help
215-222-2765 | digitalsupport@inquirer.com
Monday- Friday: 6:30 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.
Saturday-Sunday: 7:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.
You are receiving this email because you are a subscriber of The Philadelphia Inquirer Philadelphia Inquirer, 801 Market Street, Suite 300, Philadelphia, PA 19107 About Inquirer.com | Terms of Use and Privacy Policy | Copyright Â© The Philadelphia Inquirer LLC
